title: K of emitted electrons if frequency is doubled

content.question: Light is incident on a metal plate with a work function of <math alttext="4 electron volts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>eV</mtext></math>. It is determined that electrons are emitted from the plate with a kinetic energy of <math alttext="1 electron volt" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>eV</mtext></math>. If the frequency of the incident light is doubled, what will be the kinetic energy of the emitted electrons?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
